methodology: Web search of city charters, municipal codes, and official government websites

confirmed_at_large.notes: 6 councilmembers elected at-large (all voters vote for all seats). Council members must reside in their district but are elected citywide. Mayor elected at-large.
confirmed_at_large.evidence: City has district residency requirements but at-large voting. All registered voters cast ballots for all Council seats.

has_districts.notes: Has 4 town council districts (Sheridan 1-4) per Hamilton County 2023 map. Each district elects representatives. NOT at-large.
has_districts.source: Hamilton County, IN - Sheridan Town Council Districts Map 2023
has_districts.recommendation: Low coverage (4.2%) indicates wrong data layer, not at-large voting. Need to source correct Sheridan town council district boundaries.

has_districts.notes: Has 10 city council districts, with 2 members elected per district. Recent redistricting completed July 2023.
has_districts.recommendation: Low coverage (10.6%) indicates wrong data source. Need correct Bridgeport city council district boundaries (not state legislative districts).

has_districts.notes: Has 5 city council single-member districts. Voters in city limits vote for both parish and city council. Recent redistricting after 2020 census.
has_districts.source: Lafayette Consolidated Government, The Current LA
has_districts.recommendation: Coverage 44.1% suggests partial data or overlap with parish council districts. Need city council district boundaries only.

has_districts.notes: Has 4 city council districts. Councilors represent their districts. District map available at city document center.
has_districts.recommendation: Coverage 45.3% suggests wrong data layer. Need correct Farmington city council district boundaries.

has_districts.notes: Has 5 city council districts. Only the mayor is elected at-large; council members elected by district.
has_districts.source: City of Chattahoochee Hills official website
has_districts.recommendation: Exclusivity failures likely due to wrong data source, not at-large voting. Need correct district boundaries.

formerly_at_large.notes: TRANSITIONED from at-large to district elections in 2023. Previously elected at-large, now has 6 geographic districts as of November 2023 election.
formerly_at_large.reason: Idaho state law requiring cities over 100,000 population to use district elections (law passed 2020)
formerly_at_large.recommendation: Coverage 40.0% suggests data may still reflect at-large structure or wrong data source. Need current 2023+ district boundaries.

formerly_at_large.notes: TRANSITIONED from at-large to by-district elections in 2018 via Ordinance No. 2018-459. New district map adopted April 2022 (Ordinance No. 2022-502).
formerly_at_large.source: City of Big Bear Lake official website
formerly_at_large.recommendation: Exclusivity failures suggest data reflects pre-2018 at-large structure or wrong source. Need current district boundaries (post-2022 redistricting).

key_findings: Milton, GA confirmed at-large with 6 council seats elected citywide
Sheridan, IN has 4 districts - low coverage indicates wrong data source
Bridgeport, CT has 10 districts - needs correct city council boundaries
Meridian, ID and Big Bear Lake, CA both transitioned from at-large to district elections (2023 and 2018 respectively)
Lafayette and Farmington both have district systems - coverage issues indicate data source problems
Most low-coverage cities have districts but wrong data layers in registry
registry_additions: Add Milton, GA (1351670) to at-large registry

Meridian, ID: Need post-2023 district boundaries reflecting new structure
Lafayette, LA: Need city council districts separate from parish council
